snippet: Facebook's initial public offering is expected to value the whole company at $75 billion to $100 billion. Ultimately, that offering will mint a lot of billionaires and millionaires. Among them are the graffiti artist David Choe, who painted the walls...
abstract: Facebook's initial public offering is expected to value the whole company at $75 billion to $100 billion. Ultimately, that offering will mint a lot of billionaires and millionaires. Among them are the graffiti artist David Choe, who painted the walls of Facebook's first headquarters, and of course Mark Zuckerberg, the company's co-founder and chief executive, worth $28.4 billion.
lead_paragraph: Facebook's initial public offering is expected to value the whole company at $75 billion to $100 billion. Ultimately, that offering will mint a lot of billionaires and millionaires.

headline.main: Daily Report: Facebook Makes More Millionaires
